full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
Janitorial Services - RCMP Morden Detachment ([English](#english)/[Français](#français))

#### Reference Number
cb-668-81493662

#### Solicitation Number
M5000-21-0314/A

#### Tender Status
Expired

#### Procurement Category
SRV

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Selection Criteria
Lowest Price

#### Contract Details

* Contract Period: 2 years from contract date
* Option to Extend: Up to 3 additional 1-year periods
* Security: This solicitation contains a security requirement
* Site Visit: A site visit is being offered. Please refer to the Invitation to Tender (ITT) for additional details.

#### Background

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contractor to provide janitorial services for the RCMP Morden Detachment in Manitoba, Canada. The contractor must provide all labour, materials, equipment, transportation, and daily site supervision necessary to provide janitorial services in accordance with the Invitation to Tender and Annex “A” - Janitorial Services.

#### Important Information

* Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit as per page one of the Invitation to Tender (I.T.T.).
* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. As a result, the integrity provisions are being applied in RCMP contracting activities as outlined in this solicitation.
* Canada will make available Notices of Proposed Procurement (NPP), bid solicitations and related documents for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.
* Indigenous Procurement: The RCMP encourages Indigenous businesses to participate in this tender opportunity. The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for all levels of government and the private sector to identify Indigenous business capacity.
